snippet: It may be fleeting, but for the moment Mitt Romney's string of bad luck has given his campaign an air of anxiety -- not what it wants to exude fewer than 50 days before the election.
abstract: It may be fleeting, but for the moment Mitt Romney's string of bad luck has given his campaign an air of anxiety -- not what it wants to exude fewer than 50 days before the election.

headline.main: For Romney Campaign, an Unpleasant Week
